item.description:
Our newcomer friend Kathy is hosting a potluck at her place to enjoy the moon, her porch, pumpkins, etc on the 23rd..7:00 - 11:00 pm. A few of her paintings may be hanging around as well.

Kathy will make squash soup, a pie, salad, and offer some wine. When you rsvp, please let us know what you will contribute to the harvest spread.

All those who rsvp, will be notified of the address the day of the event since this is a private residence. Make sure to update rsvp and commit only if you know you will be there to leave room for those who definitely want to be there.
item.name: Harvest Moon - Potluck on a Porch
